document.full_text: china needs to raise interest rates further to rein in inflation, which is likely to stay high in coming years due to rising global commodity prices, li daokui, an adviser to the people's bank of china said on monday.
document.title: china needs to raise rates to tame inflation: china central bank
lines_and_colors: china needs to raise interest rates further to rein in inflation, which is likely to stay high in coming years due to rising global commodity prices, li daokui, an adviser to the people's bank of china said on monday.
